creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: buildings in browns with blue and red roofs, interspersed with trees, stairs and red Shinto gates in lower foreground, above that a row of multi-colored stone lanterns, large five-story pagoda in red and blue, large building (the Tokyo National Museum) in upper register with fountain and figures in front
medium: Stencil print (kappazuri); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Two Scenes in Tokyo 東京風景二選
title: Ueno Scene
